trans-unit.source: Represents the delegate for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs"></xref> event.

The WebPartVerbsEventHandler class is used to specify the methods that are invoked in response to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> event, which occurs when the Web Parts verbs are created for a zone that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WebPartVerbsEventHandler brukes til å angi metoder som startes som svar på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs>hendelse som oppstår når webdeler verbene opprettes for en sone som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs>

trans-unit.source: Web Parts verbs represent actions that users can perform in the user interface (UI) of a Web Parts page, such as minimizing, closing, or restoring controls; adding controls to a page; or canceling an action.
trans-unit.target: Webdeler verb representere handlinger som brukere kan utføre i brukergrensesnittet (UI) av webdeler siden, for eksempel minimere, lukker eller gjenoppretting kontroller; å legge til kontroller på en side. eller avbryte en handling.

trans-unit.source: Verbs can appear in both the header and footer areas of a zone, and there are both standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom verbs that can be added by developers.
trans-unit.target: Verb som kan vises i både topp- og bunntekst moduler i en sone, og det finnes både standard verb som er angitt med webdeler kontrollen settet og egendefinerte verb som kan legges ved utviklere.

trans-unit.source: A verb is represented in the UI by a clickable object, which you can set to appear as a hyperlink, an image, or a button, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Et verb som er representert i Brukergrensesnittet ved å klikke objektet, som du kan angi skal vises som en hyperkobling, et bilde eller en knapp ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zone provides a standard set of verbs that get rendered in a Web Parts control's verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>sone inneholder et standard sett med verb som få gjengis i webdeler kontrollens verb-menyen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: A custom Web Parts zone, or a Web Parts control inside a Web Parts zone, can add additional verbs to the menu.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinerte webdeler sone eller en webdeler kontroll i en webdeler sone kan legge til flere verb på menyen.

trans-unit.source: A control in a Web Parts zone can add verbs to the control's verbs menu by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class and overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll i en webdeler sone kan legge til verb kontrollens verb menyen ved arving fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>basere klassen og overstyrer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the control does not inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class, you can add a new verb by implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface, and then overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen ikke arver fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>basisklasse, kan du legge til en ny verbet ved å implementere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable>grensesnittet og deretter overstyrer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method allows derived classes to override the event without attaching a delegate to it.
trans-unit.target: Det beskyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden kan avledede klasser Hvis du vil overstyre hendelsen uten å knytte en representant til det.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A derived class must always call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method of the base class to ensure that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Den utledede klassen må alltid kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>-metoden til basisklassen å sikre at registrerte representanter mottar hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>
